title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun               Park Fun       Talk to a Native American Guest Host at the Satwiwa Native American Indian Culture Center. You might have something in common! Go to Satwiwa... Take a virtual tour of a 250 year old Chumash Village. Explore Culture... See a real waterfall and explore the burned ruins of a canyon home. Visit Solstice Canyon...
